title: Bloomberg Markets: Utreras Sees Airbnb Gaining Users in U.S.
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Utreras Sees Airbnb Gaining Users in U.S.
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Martin Utreras Vice President of Forecasting eMarketer Inc Discussing seeing growth of Airbnb users in the U.S. This year, 36.8 million US adults will use Airbnb, up 21.2% over last year.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
